author: Ursula Perano
title: Bipartisan senators propose $500 billion for states in next coronavirus rescue package
description: Sens. Bob Menendez (D-N.J.) and Bill Cassidy (R-La.) on Sunday proposed a $500 billion fund for state and local governments to be included Congress' next coronavirus rescue package.Why it matters: The $2 trillion stimulus bill passed by Congress last month pr…
content:
Sens. Bob Menendez (D-N.J.) and Bill Cassidy (R-La.) on Sunday proposed a $500 billion fund for state and local governments to be included Congress' next coronavirus rescue package.
Why it matters: The $2 trillion stimulus bill passed by Congress last month … [+2080 chars]
